records.Name: Terms of Service, English, 2019-02-19
records.FormText__c:
App Terms of Service
Version: 2019-02-19

These Website Standard Terms of Service written on this webpage shall manage your use of our website. These Terms will be applied fully and affect to your use of this Website. By using this Website, you agreed to accept all terms of service written in here. You must not use this Website if you disagree with any of these Website Standard Terms of Service.

Minors or people below 18 years old are not allowed to use this Website.
